title: spack configure not stopping after configure step when in a spack environment

labels.name: triage
labels.description: The issue needs to be prioritized

body:
When in a spack environment running the `spack configure ...` step does not stop after configure but continues into the build stage. The expected behavior is observed when not in a spack environment. Other build phases, `fetch`, `stage`, and `patch`, work as expected.



### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack env create myenv2
$ spack env activate myenv2
$ spack configure openmpi
...


```
